thread.title: Kotoko Life Patron and owner Otumfuo demands report from board
thread.title_full: Kotoko Life Patron and owner Otumfuo demands report from board

title: Kotoko Life Patron and owner Otumfuo demands report from board
text:
10:40 CET Kotoko Life Patron and owner Otumfuo demands report from board - www.ghanasoccernet.com Asante Kotoko Board 
The Asantehene, Otumfuo Osei Tutu II, has given the outgoing board of Kumasi Asante Kotoko three weeks to submit its report to Manhyia for a final decision to be made on who takes over the running of the club . 
A source at the Manhyia Palace told the Daily Graphic Wednesday that Otumfuo had demanded the report to be ready today before making a planned trip outside the country. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us The only thing to do, to have your dream to come to pass, is to wake up. By: Channel Zero
